src_original: yadi ca pramāṇatas teṣāṃ teṣāṃ prasiddhir arthānām /
teṣāṃ punaḥ prasiddhiṃ brūhi kathaṃ teṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ // NagVv_31 //

yadi punaḥ manyase pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ pramāṇato 'rthānāṃ prasiddhir iti /  hīyate pratijñā /  (Vv 274)  tathāpi  anyaiḥ yadi pramāṇaiḥ pramāṇasidhir bhavaty anavasthā syān /  nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya // NagVv_32 //
yadi punar manyase /  pramāṇaiḥ prameyāṇāṃ prasiddhis teṣāṃ pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir anavasthāprasaṅgaḥ /
nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya /  asyānavasthāprasaṅge ādeḥ siddhir nāsti /
kiṃ kāraṇaṃ teṣam api hi pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ siddhis teṣām anyair iti nāsty ādiḥ /
āder asadbhāvāt kuto madhyaṃ kuto antaḥ /
tasmāt teṣāṃ pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ nopapadyateti /  (Vv 276)  atha manyase teṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ vinā pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ prameyānāṃ punar arthānāṃ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir iti /
